```lisp
[
  (:action acquire ; Acquire an item from one location to another
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?from - location ?to - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?from) (at ?item ?from))
    :effect (and (at ?item ?to) (not (at ?item ?from)) (at ?p ?to))
  ),

  (:action finish ; Complete a task with precision and update the status
    :parameters (?agent - person ?task - task ?item - object ?tool - tool ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (at ?item ?location) (inventory ?agent ?tool) (precondition_met ?item))
    :effect (and (completed ?task) (not (incomplete ?task)))
  ),

  (:action apply ; Apply a layer of material to an object and update its state
    :parameters (?p - person ?loc - location ?obj - object ?tool - tool ?material - material)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (at ?obj ?loc) (inventory ?p ?tool) (inventory ?p ?material)
                       (or (and (dry ?obj))
                           (and (wet ?obj) (tacky ?obj))))
    :effect (and (wet ?obj) (tacky ?obj) (not (dry ?obj)))
  )
]
```
